data.body: Extend wave computation and API payload with readiness semantics and diagnostics that the UI can rely on. Include explicit fields for ready/runnable status, unresolved blockers, and deterministic recommendation ordering.
data.description: Extend wave computation and API payload with readiness semantics and diagnostics that the UI can rely on. Include explicit fields for ready/runnable status, unresolved blockers, and deterministic recommendation ordering.
data.title: Wave planner data model v2 (readiness + blockers + diagnostics)
